title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.16 - Rear view mirror
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.16 - Rear view mirror

State Regulations

Every motor vehicle which has a cab for the operator shall be
equipped with at least one mirror, so adjusted that the operator of such
vehicle shall have a clear view of the road behind such vehicle for a distance
of 200 feet. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1152.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
